title: Looking for gold+ top laner
body:
We are a team composed of silver-diamond players that are looking for a top lane player. Using curse.

What we are looking for in the player:
A friend. Someone who isn't going to get frustrated and tear the team apart from poor attitude. Be able to laugh.
Willing to learn from losses, wins and each other alike.
Having good ideas on how to play the game already. Everything can and will be improved on.
Do not ignore or say no to someones calls. If it's the wrong call it will be said and discussed about after the game and the outcome will be noted for future games.

Things to note:
We want to have fun playing the game and improving at it in the way that it is meant to be played, not solo queue yolo crap.
The first games are mostly going to be us getting comfortable with each other and getting some set game plans down.
We will continue to realise our mistakes and be mindful of them in future games in order to improve. Do not take any criticism in a bad way, feel free to discuss your point of view on something if you disagree.
Input is welcome from all members and if there are any issues you can come to me, even if I am the issue.

Write below, make it convincing if you want and I'll add whoever I pick in game.
